item.title: U.S. Postal Service will cut workforce by 10,000 after signing deal with Elon Musk's DOGE
item.description: Postmaster General Louis DeJoy told Congress he signed an agreement with Elon Musk's DOGE to help the money-losing agency address "big problems."
